column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: data. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix dataOntology: <http://www.example.org/dataOntology#> .dataOntology:Dataset rdf:type rdfs:Class .dataOntology:dataElement rdf:type rdfs:Class .dataOntology:hasDataElement rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain dataOntology:Dataset ;    rdfs:range dataOntology:dataElement .dataOntology:hasDataType rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain dataOntology:dataElement ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Class .dataOntology:StringData rdf:type rdfs:Class .dataOntology:NumericData rdf:type rdfs:Class .dataOntology:DateData rdf:type rdfs:Class .dataOntology:hasValue rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain dataOntology:dataElement ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .dataOntology:hasNumericValue rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf dataOntology:hasValue ;    rdfs:domain dataOntology:dataElement ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal .dataOntology:hasStringValue rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf dataOntology:hasValue ;    rdfs:domain dataOntology:dataElement ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .dataOntology:hasDateValue rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf dataOntology:hasValue ;    rdfs:domain dataOntology:dataElement ;    rdfs:range xsd:date .
